overview_of_class:
This class serves as an introduction to international relations (IR). We will attempt to tackle some of the "big questions" in IR. Examples include:
? Why are there wars?
? Are nuclear weapons dangerous or stabilizing?
? Why are some countries so poor? Is foreign aid the solution?
? Can China rise peacefully?
? What do terrorists want?
? Does international law prevent human rights abuses?
? Is the world getting safer?
name: Introduction to International Relations
subject: POLI_SCI
